text: Dr Grayson bashes Trump:  "A man DIED & his wife is in ICU after they ingested #chloroquine, one of the anti-malarials that @realDonaldTrump touted."  Like Dr Gorka says, the poor fools did NOT use the drug my president "touted"!  They drank poison!  The left is truly damned! https://t.co/zHpVRgVB8S
